meanings.definition: Enzymes that catalyze the hydrolysis of esters.
meanings.sent1: The esterases in our bodies help to break down fats for digestion.
meanings.sent2: Scientists study esterases to understand how they work in biological processes.
meanings.sent3: The esterases at the enzyme party were the life of the hydrolysis dance floor.
meanings.sent4: Her determination to succeed was like the powerful action of esterases breaking down barriers.
meanings.sent5: The classroom demonstration vividly showed how esterases break apart molecules.

meanings.definition: Proteins that break down esters into their component parts.
meanings.sent1: The lab technician studied the esterases under the microscope.
meanings.sent2: Esterases play a crucial role in the digestion of food in the stomach.
meanings.sent3: The chef joked that the esterases in the kitchen were the real food critics.
meanings.sent4: The teamwork of the esterases resembled a well-oiled machine breaking down compounds.
meanings.sent5: The movie scene depicted the esterases as tiny superheroes dismantling esters.
